visual_style_summary: Rich, warm tones with a luxurious gold palette emphasizing intricate textures, ornate details, and reflective surfaces. The overall mood is regal and traditional, evoking cultural pride and elegance through soft, ambient lighting and subtle camera movements that highlight craftsmanship without distortion.

scenes.description: Close-up macro shot of the necklace's floral motifs and dangling elements, emphasizing detailed gold filigree and sparkle with soft ambient highlights.
scenes.camera_movement: Static with slight focus pull across motifs
scenes.lighting_setup: Soft, warm diffused lighting with gentle spotlighting on motifs; ambient gold-toned glow
focus_points: Reflections and sparkle on polished surfaces

scenes.description: Slow, cinematic reveal starting with a close-up of the floral motif, gradually pulling back to show the full necklace, mounted on a luxurious textured surface.
scenes.lighting_setup: Consistent soft lighting emphasizing details, with gentle side fill to reveal textures

scenes.description: Orbital slow rotation around the necklace, highlighting reflective surfaces, craftsmanship, and textures with macro sparkle highlights during movement.
scenes.camera_movement: Constant slow orbit at fixed height, centered on the product
scenes.lighting_setup: Soft top lighting with subtle side fill to maintain consistent highlights and reflections
focus_points: Sparkle highlights on gemstones and metal

scenes.description: Soft ambient shot of the full set, emphasizing the ornate design and craftsmanship, with the camera gently pulling away to increase depth and grandeur.
scenes.camera_movement: Slow pull away for a majestic reveal
scenes.lighting_setup: Diffuse, warm lighting creating a glowing effect on the set

technical_notes: Ensure all reflections and sparkle effects are physically accurate, with no overblown star filters or artificial glows. Maintain consistent geometry of the jewellery throughout all scenes, with precise lighting to highlight filigree textures and reflective surfaces. Use macro lenses (100mm) for close-up details at f/2.8, appropriate focus pulls, and steady camera movements. White cyclorama background should remain clean and neutral during orbit and reveal shots to preserve color accuracy and luxury aesthetic.
